name: Deep Space Overkill
description:
Before you even try launching it, LOWER YOUR SYSTEM VOLUME! This was developed in an old laptop and the volume ended up being too high.

This was the first game I ever created and finished. It's a very simple star-ship game made in a weekend and improved upon later. It has some balancing issues but I was quite proud of the result. Try beating your high score!

Made with Game Maker. I'd love to fix the volume issue, but I lost the source code ages ago.

I used Bayonetta's awesome music for it. Of course, all payments have been disabled to avoid royalty issues.

Enjoy!
